this_title: Postcards from the Future: The Chuck Palahniuk Documentary
introduction: （imdb）Fight Club caused a literary movement among a generation of readers. His stories have incited fan frenzies and made people pass out. Now he's the star of his very own documentaryWith two new books and two controversial tour, fans can easily say that 2003 proved to be a landmark year for the best selling author Chuck Palahniuk. But what many people don't know, is that it all began several months earlier at a four day conference in Edinboro, Pennsylvania. This is that story...
chinese_title: Postcards from the Future: The Chuck Palahniuk Documentary
